00020                 b3Transform tr;

00023                 return tr(point);

00027         typedef float4  b3Quat;

00031 inline float4 b3FastNormalize4(float4 v)
00032 {
00033         v = (float4)(v.xyz,0.f);
00034         return fast_normalize(v);
00035 }

00037 inline b3Quat b3QuatMul(b3Quat a, b3Quat b);
00038 inline b3Quat b3QuatNormalized(b3QuatConstArg in);
00039 inline b3Quat b3QuatRotate(b3QuatConstArg q, b3QuatConstArg vec);

00043 inline b3Quat b3QuatMul(b3QuatConstArg a, b3QuatConstArg b)
00044 {
00045         b3Quat ans;
00046         ans = b3Cross3( a, b );
00047         ans += a.w*b+b.w*a;
00048 //      ans.w = a.w*b.w - (a.x*b.x+a.y*b.y+a.z*b.z);
00049         ans.w = a.w*b.w - b3Dot3F4(a, b);
00050         return ans;
00051 }
00052 
00053 inline b3Quat b3QuatNormalized(b3QuatConstArg in)
00054 {
00055         b3Quat q;
00056         q=in;
00057         //return b3FastNormalize4(in);
00058         float len = native_sqrt(dot(q, q));
00059         if(len > 0.f)
00060         {
00061                 q *= 1.f / len;
00062         }
00063         else
00064         {
00065                 q.x = q.y = q.z = 0.f;
00066                 q.w = 1.f;
00067         }
00068         return q;
00069 }
00070 inline float4 b3QuatRotate(b3QuatConstArg q, b3QuatConstArg vec)
00071 {
00072         b3Quat qInv = b3QuatInvert( q );
00073         float4 vcpy = vec;
00074         vcpy.w = 0.f;
00075         float4 out = b3QuatMul(b3QuatMul(q,vcpy),qInv);
00076         return out;
00077 }
00078

00080 
00081 inline b3Quat b3QuatInverse(b3QuatConstArg q)
00082 {
00083         return (b3Quat)(-q.xyz, q.w);
00084 }
00085 
00086 inline b3Quat b3QuatInvert(b3QuatConstArg q)
00087 {
00088         return (b3Quat)(-q.xyz, q.w);
00089 }
00090 
00091 inline float4 b3QuatInvRotate(b3QuatConstArg q, b3QuatConstArg vec)
00092 {
00093         return b3QuatRotate( b3QuatInvert( q ), vec );
00094 }
00095 
00096 inline b3Float4 b3TransformPoint(b3Float4ConstArg point, b3Float4ConstArg translation, b3QuatConstArg  orientation)
00097 {
00098         return b3QuatRotate( orientation, point ) + (translation);
00099 }
